newsitem.title: USA: Creative says expects NASD decision soon.
newsitem.headline: Creative says expects NASD decision soon.

text.p: Creative Programming and Technology Ventures Inc on Thursday said it had met with the National Association of Securities Dealers regarding a possible de-listing of the company's stock and that it expects to learn soon of a decision on the issue.
Despite the possibility of a de-listing, the company said it continues to pursue a stock repurchase plan authorized by its directors in December.

The company reported that its stock repurchase will be made from time to time in open-market transactions, in accordance with applicable SEC and Nasdaq regulations and subject to the availability of stock.
The number of shares to be repurchased was not specified. This is the second repurchase plan that the company has made since it became a public company in November 1993.
